Performing Basic Analysis on Dataset1 

```{r}
head(games1)
colnames(games1)
```


```{r}
plot_str(games1)
games1$bgg_url<-as.character(games1$bgg_url)
games1$names<-as.character(games1$names)
games1$year<-year(as.Date(as.character(games1$year), format="%Y"))
games1$image_url<-as.character(games1$image_url)
games1$designer<-as.character(games1$designer)
summary(games1)
```
Some of the years were given as -3000 and -2200. Those got converted to NA values
```{r}
plot_missing(games1)
#Replacing NA values with 0
games1[is.na(games1)]<-0
plot_missing(games1)
```

```{r}
plot_histogram(games1)
```

```{r}
plot_density(games1)
```

```{r}
plot_correlation(games1)
```
